description: This file defines the OrdersAdapter class for a RecyclerView, which displays a list of orders showing their ID, total amount, and status, in an Android application. It also defines the OrderVH ViewHolder class for binding order data to UI components.

classes.name: OrdersAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for displaying a list of Order items in a RecyclerView, utilizing DiffUtil for efficient updates.

classes.name: OrderVH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that binds individual Order data to the item_order layout views.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new OrderVH instance by inflating the layout for an order item.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from the Order item at the specified position to the provided ViewHolder.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds an Order object to the ViewHolder's UI components, setting order ID, total amount, and status.
